name: Blood And Mead
description:
"Better to fight and fall than to live without mead." - Ragnar the Bold, 100AD.

A scoundrel Viking, banished for his godlike thirst becomes an unlikely hero as he is called on to solve the mystery of a mead drought threatening his Norse homeland.

Join Olaf the Drunk on a quest that sets him off to explore the beautiful realm of Midgard and the uncharted lands beyond the Great Sea; the far off ancient wonders of feudal Asia, the Silk Road and Pharaoh’s Egypt!

Blood And Mead was crafted meticulously by solo indie developer John Stejskal over the course of four years.





  • A design philosophy inspired by Nintendo’s Shigeru Miyamoto.
  • Explore a vast ancient landscape, from the mythological Viking homeland of Midgard to the Silk Road and Pharaoh's Egypt.
  • Craft forbidden God’s Blend mead recipes that bestow the drinker with the powers of the ancient Norse gods.
  • Tight combat utilizing multiple weapons, shields and mead... lots and lots of mead.
  • Go head-to-head with the gods themselves, in epic boss battles.
  • Ride a pig naked though a burning village.
  • Upgrade armor and weapons to become a true Viking warrior.
  • Sail to the mysterious exotic lands beyond the Great Sea.
  • Enjoy a captivating sound track with a delightful medieval flair.
